hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:"I said: 'How are you this morning, O Messenger of Allah?' He said: 'I am better than one who did not get up fasting, and who did not visit and sick

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يُقَالُ لَهُ كَيْفَ أَصْبَحْتَ
chapter.eng-name: If a man is asked how are you this morning?
